input.sentences: it 's our yearly vacation | and we decided to spend as much time as possible around the beach and the ocean .
on the pier | there was a beautiful view and a fresh breeze .
it got a little crowded though | so we decided to head back down to the shore .
we loved watching the waves roll in and feeling them on our feet .
then | some visitors arrived . we fed them some bread and watched them fly around before heading back inside for lunch .
output.sentences: My husband and I enjoyed catching some fresh air on the pier.
The sky was so clear and blue, we decided to take a walk.
The sound of the waves rolling into shore was so relaxing.
We had lunch on the beach and people watched.
